Articles.Content:
I recently did a clean install when I upgraded to KSP 1.12 (as this is to be the last major revision I figured this was a good time for a fresh start). The only mods I have installed are either those that have been updated to support 1.12 or a couple of required dependencies that are still officially on 1.11 but for which users have reported no issues in 1.12 on the forums. KSP loads cleanly and in career mode everything seems to be working normally.

I can't seem to play the Making History missions though - when I start a mission, I am taken to the VAB, but that's where things get weird - I get no mission briefing and the controls in the VAB are not functional (I can't leave the building, even the Escape menu doesn't open up, I have to use Ctrl-Alt-Del to kill KSP). It seems something is interfering with the controls in the VAB in missions (but not in tutorials or career mode).

Does this sound familiar to anyone, or are there any mods known to cause this kind of issue?

Thanks,

Paul

The mods I have installed are as follows: 

Animated Decouplers (AnimatedDecouplers v1.4.2.2)
Astronomer's Visual Pack (AstronomersVisualPack 3:v4.11)
Astronomer's Visual Pack-8k Textures (AVP-8kTextures v1.12)
B9 Part Switch (B9PartSwitch v2.18.0)
Better SR Bs (BetterSRBs 1.2.6)
Bluedog Design Bureau (BluedogDB v1.8.1a)
Breaking Ground (BreakingGround-DLC 1.7.0)
